name: Telepathic Puzzler
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2021, with the theme of "Joined Together".

Play as the two telepathically connected puzzle pieces, Poly and Beta, in their journey to join together!

The goal is to get Poly and Beta to join together by maneuvering through obstacles and understanding the telepathic controls.

There is a currently known bug where spikes and enemies don't kill the player when they continuously move, so try not to hold down WASD if you'd like to play the game as intended.

Controls: WASD to move, R to restart a level, M to toggle the music

Credits: Made by Alexander Ibay, Simon Huang, Felipe Jun Iglesia, and Darren Fang. Some assets made by Kenney. Fonts made by Castpixel and Pixel Overload
